description: This file defines a client-side API service for interacting with a backend API to fetch recipe data. It includes utility functions to determine the API base URL, perform fetch requests, handle errors, and expose two main functions: fetchRecipes and fetchRecipeById, which retrieve recipes either from the backend or from mock data depending on configuration.

methods.name: normalizeBaseUrl(url)
methods.description: Normalizes the given URL by removing a trailing slash if present.

methods.name: getApiBase()
methods.description: Determines the API base URL from environment variables.

methods.name: hasApiBase()
methods.description: Checks whether a valid API base URL is set.

methods.name: requestJson(path)
methods.description: Performs a fetch request to the specified API endpoint and returns the parsed JSON response, throwing an error if the request fails.

methods.name: fetchRecipes()
methods.description: Fetches all recipes from the backend API if configured; otherwise returns mock data.

methods.name: fetchRecipeById(id)
methods.description: Fetches a single recipe by ID from the backend API if configured; otherwise retrieves it from mock data.
